IsBatchLoading

Gets whether the graph is currently in batch loading mode. During batch loading, collection change notifications are suppressed.

public bool IsBatchLoading { get; }

BeginBatchLoad()

Begins batch loading mode. Collection change notifications are suppressed until EndBatchLoad is called. Use this when adding many nodes/edges at once.

public void BeginBatchLoad()

EndBatchLoad()

Ends batch loading mode and raises BatchLoadCompleted event.

public void EndBatchLoad()

Events

BatchLoadCompleted

Event raised when batch loading completes. Subscribe to this to refresh UI after bulk operations.

public event EventHandler? BatchLoadCompleted
